alert.note: Alert for Telfair (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 6:41AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Telfair County through 715 AM EDT... At 641 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Jacksonville, or 13 miles south of McRae, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to penny sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to exposed surfaces is possible. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lumber City, Jacksonville, Horse Creek Wma and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
